1.2.name: wordpress/pb-easydiv
1.2.description:
pb-easyDiv is filter to insert <div> tags easily, useful if your're using a WYSIWYG- or any other RichtText editor.

To create a <div> in your posts easily, please use the following code: [div]CONTENT[/div]

Well, a simple <div> would be quite senseless without attributes assigned to it, so you would like to use the following code: [div ATTRIBUTES]CONTENT[/div] Example: [div class="whatyouwanthere" id="DivID" title="MyDiv"]CONTENT[/div]

Well, a simple <div> would be quite senseless without attributes assigned to it, so you would like to use the following code: [div ATTRIBUTES]CONTENT[/div] Example: [div class="whatyouwanthere" id="DivID" title="MyDiv"]CONTENT[/div]
